db:abstract.db:para: Represents a filtering constraint for NDEF message records.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.2.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The NdefFilter type is used with the NearField type to read NDEF messages from NFC Forum tags that match a given structure.

db:section.db:title: maximum : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the maximum number of records of the given type that must be in the NDEF message for it match.
To match any number of records set both the minimum and maximum properties to -1.

db:section.db:title: minimum : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the minimum number of records of the given type that must be in the NDEF message for it match.
To match any number of records set both the minimum and maximum properties to -1.

db:section.db:title: type : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the NDEF record type that the filter matches. This property must be set to the fully qualified record type, i.e. including the NIS and NSS prefixes. For example set to urn:nfc:wkt:U to match NFC RTD-URI records.
